content.text: Hey baby how are you doing?

Girl i aint lookin no where else for no bitches, on god, you gonna get plenty more.

You can trust me girl, i aint playin no games, you my main, for real.

You better, or I’ll be throwin’ hands! 😤💥 Happy ain't enough if I ain't your only priority, babe! 👀💖
Listen bitch, you already know i aint after no other bitch.
Yasss, you better keep it that way, or I’ll snatch a bitch! 👊😏 Ain't nobody touchin' my throne, hun! 👑🔥

No i dont have no bitch i swear.

hey bitch what are you doing?

Baby your sexy as fuck, for real. I dont have time for side quests. Only you baby girl.
